meta.title: Bookings
meta.description: Manage your reservations, view details, and take action on your reservations.

query.title: Search by Keyword
query.description: Search by listing title, description, city, district, or country name.
query.label: Keyword

cancel.title: Cancel Reservation
cancel.description: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to cancel the reservation?

cancel.title: Cancel Reservation
cancel.subtitle: Are you sure you want to cancel your reservation?
cancel.label: Confirmation Text
cancel.text: Once you cancel your reservation, you cannot undo this action. Please be sure before canceling.
cancel.confirmation: To cancel your reservation, please type '{{text}}' in the box below.

mark-private.title: Hide Visibility
mark-private.subtitle: Are you sure you want to hide your reservation?
mark-private.label: Confirmation Text
mark-private.text: If you don't want others to see your reservation, you can hide it. When you hide your reservation, only you, the business owner, and our authorized managers can see it.
mark-private.confirmation: To hide your reservation, please type '{{text}}' in the box below.

mark-public.title: Make Public
mark-public.subtitle: Are you sure you want to make your reservation public?
mark-public.label: Confirmation Text
mark-public.text: If you want others to see your reservation, you can make it public. When you make your reservation public, everyone can see it.
mark-public.confirmation: To make your reservation public, please type '{{text}}' in the box below.
mark-public.confirm: Yes, I Want to Make Public

details.anError: An error occurred while retrieving the detail data

pricing.notHaveComission: Commission is not included in the calculation

alert.title: Notification
alert.message: Commission is not included in this price. Please proceed to the payment page to see the net amount you will pay.

noResults.title: No Results Found
noResults.description: When you create a reservation, it will appear here. Please visit our website to create a reservation.
noResults.descriptionFiltered: No reservation found matching your filters.
